mil7.3.1:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘labulataya ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.3.1:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, labulata tine va katthe va lataya va sondikahi alambitva tassupari vaddhati;
mil7.3.1:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena arahatte abhivaddhitukamena manasa arammanam alambitva arahatte abhivaddhitabbam.
mil7.3.1:1.4: Idam, maharaja, labulataya ekam angam gahetabbam.
